entry.title: Tahoe Tack Silver Texas Star Show Spotted Leather Western Horse Breast Collar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Breast Collars
Price: 62.95

Tahoe Tack’s Silver Texas Star Show Spotted Leather Western Horse Breast Collar is an attractive new Medium Oil leather breast collar that is a part of the Texas Star series. This new leather breast collar features a flashy engraved 1.25” Texas Star concho placed in the center of the breast collar, as well as attractive stainless steel show spots covering the body of the breast collar. This breast collar was designed to fit most horses weighing between 1,000-1,250 lbs and has a total length of 53” - 59”, and measures 29” - 31” from the center of the breast collar to the snap. Tahoe Tack’s Silver Texas Star collection also includes matching tack pieces such as a browband headstall, slip ear headstall, noseband, split reins, and spur straps.


  • PART OF THE TEXAS STAR COLLECTION - this breast collar is part of Tahoe Tack’s new Texas Star collection, which is composed of matching Medium Oil leather tack pieces featuring Texas Star conchos and stainless steel show spots.
  • DESIGNED TO FIT MOST HORSES - this breast collar was designed to fit most horses weighing between 1,000-1,250 lbs and has a total length of 53” - 59”, and measures 29” - 31” from the center of the breast collar to the snap.
  • SPOTTED TEXAS STAR DESIGN - this breast collar features a flashy engraved 1.25” Texas Star concho in the center of the breast collar, as well as attractive stainless steel show spots covering the entire breast collar.
  • CENTER D-RING ACCOMMODATES TIE DOWN - this breast collar has a D-ring placed in the center of the breast collar to allow for the easy addition and removal of a tie down.
  • ONE YEAR WARRANTY - this product comes with a one-year limited manufacturer’s warranty that protects against quality issues and defects. To register your product, visit the manufacturer Derby Originals' website.


Measurements:

Total Length: 53” - 59”

To the Girth: 29” - 31

Width: Tapers from 1 ¼” to ⅝”

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Hand-Tooled Floral Buckaroo Western Breast Collar USA Leather
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Breast Collars
Price: 39.95

Tahoe Tack has been making beautiful and high-quality western breast collars for over 20 years. Their breast collars feature a mix of high-quality, durable, traditional designs and elegant features that are available in every style, color, or pattern of breast collar, designed to suit all riders. Whether you’re looking for a sturdy tripping collar, a hand-tooled, ornately spotted collar for the show ring, or looking for a simple breast collar to use on trails, Tahoe has the perfect breast collar to suit your needs.

  • QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - this breast collar was designed by Tahoe Tack, a fine maker of quality western tack for over 20 years. It features durable hardware and high-quality leather that is designed to last many years with proper care.
  • USA LEATHER - this breast collar is made with high-grade American leather from Wickett and Craig of Pennsylvania, and is extraordinarily supple, soft, and long-lasting.
  • HAND-TOOLING - this breast collar features elegant and finely detailed floral tooling across its entire length.
  • HORSE SIZE AVAILABLE - this breast collar is available in Full Horse sizing to accommodate most average sized equines.
  • STAINLESS STEEL HARDWARE - this tack set features high-quality stainless steel hardware that will not rust or tarnish, and remain beautiful for years to come.

Detailed Product Information

Collection: N/A

Material: Double-Layered Leather

Leather Color: Dark Oil, London Tan

Leather Type: American Leather

Type: Breast Collar

Hand-Tooling: Yes

Tooling Type: Floral

Hardware Type: Stainless Steel

Rustproof Hardware: Yes

Inlay: No

Spotting: Yes

 

Sizing

Full Horse: 900-1250lbs

entry.title: Tahoe Tack LightUp LED Reflective Safety Battery Operated Breast Collar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Breast Collars
Price: 19.95

Tahoe Tack has been making beautiful and high-quality western breast collars for over 20 years. Their breast collars feature a mix of high-quality, durable, traditional designs and elegant features that are available in every style, color, or pattern of breast collar, designed to suit all riders. Whether you’re looking for a sturdy tripping collar, a hand-tooled, ornately spotted collar for the show ring, or looking for a simple breast collar to use on trails, Tahoe has the perfect breast collar to suit your needs.

This LED breast collar is designed to promote safety during dark, foggy, or other low-light conditions by making your horse highly visible and reflective. This breast collar does not fit like a traditional breast collar and was not intended to be used for high-impact activities like roping. Instead, it is designed to be a stand-alone safety feature, or worn over a traditional leather/nylon/rope breast collar as a cover that allows for added visibility, while your traditional breast collar functions as it was meant to. This LED breast collar is incredibly thin and lightweight so that you can add it overtop of a breast collar without adding unnecessary bulk or weight on your horse.

 

This breast collar does not have rigging/tug straps, and instead has an adjustable neck strap that can be fitted over your horse’s neck like a neck strap, or attached around the horn of your saddle if you would like it to fit higher above the shoulders, such as with a pulling collar. This breast collar also has an adjustable strap that connects to the girth via a sturdy swiveling trigger snap. Our snaps are designed to be easily removable and replaceable to extend the life of your LED breastcollar.

 

This breast collar features large patches of highly reflective material along the body, and a 9.5” strip of red LED backlit material going down the center for heightened visibility. These LEDs are powered by replaceable, long-lasting batteries.

  • QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - this breast collar was designed by Tahoe Tack, a fine maker of quality western tack for over 20 years. It features durable hardware and high-quality nylon that is designed to last many years with proper care.
  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR SAFETY IN MIND - this breast collar was designed to help prevent riding accidents and promote safety when trail riding, when riding near roads, or in low light conditions.
  • REMOVABLE STAINLESS STEEL SNAP - included with every breastcollar is a heavy-duty stainless steel trigger snap that allows for an easy on and off attachment to your girth.
  • LIGHTWEIGHT CONSTRUCTION - this breast collar is made from a lightweight yet strong polyester and nylon construction, which makes it perfect for adding overtop of your favorite breastcollar as an added safety feature.
  • ADJUSTABLE DESIGN - this breast collar features an adjustable strap along the neck, and the girth strap is also highly adjustable, allowing for this breast collar to fit most horses weighing 900-1500lbs.

These headstalls and breast collars exemplify the beauty of fine western tack and are meant to highlight your horse’s features and allow you to stand out in the show ring.

 

Features
